name: @sngn/eslint-plugin-split-and-sort-imports
description: Autofixes eslint 'sort-imports' rule and splits multiple imports into multiple lines
author: Maximilian Stejskal

scripts.build: pnpm run build:schemadts; pnpm run copy:generated; pnpm run build:types
scripts.build:schemadts: pnpm run build:schemajson && json2ts --input src/generated/sort-schema.json --output src/generated/sort-schema.d.ts
scripts.build:schemajson: mkdir -p src/generated; cat src/rules/sort-schema.js | sed -e 's/export const schema = //' -e 's/};/}/' -e 's/^\s*\/.*$//' | grep -v '^$' | prettier --parser json > src/generated/sort-schema.json
scripts.cbuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.cbuild-nx: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build-nx
scripts.copy:generated: shx mkdir -p dist/types src/generated && shx cp -r src/generated dist/types
